tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voice_recordings (
  recording_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  call_id UUID NOT NULL,
  recording_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
  recording_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE support_calls (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    duration INT,
    recording BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE support_calls (
    call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    call_date TIMESTAMP,
    caller_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    duration INTERVAL,
    audio_file BYTEA
);
CREATE TABLE support_calls ( call_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, call_datetime TIMESTAMP, call_duration INT, call_recording BYTEA )
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT, customer_email TEXT )
CREATE TABLE agents ( agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY, agent_name TEXT )

CREATE TABLE agent_calls ( agent_call_id INT PRIMARY KEY, agent_id INT, call_id INT, call_datetime TIMESTAMP, call_duration INT, call_recording BYTEA, FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id), FOREIGN KEY (call_id) REFERENCES support_calls(call_id) )
CREATE TABLE call_feedback ( feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, call_id INT, feedback_comment TEXT, rating INT, FOREIGN KEY (call_id) REFERENCES support_calls(call_id) )
